attributes.action: No Full Lockdown 2 but SMART Lockdown
attributes.additional_details:
The full lockdown will destroy economy. Small businesses can't afford rent and rates. They are already loosing for last 6 months. This will just made them bankrupt.

People are feeling financial pressure. Some have lost jobs and now rest will likely to loos their with this lockdown. Families can't afford mortgage payments and will loose their home.

Let's save lives. But Also save economy as well. BOTH are important and BOTH should survive.
attributes.background:
We don't need a full lock down of whole country . This will destroy the whole economy who is already near to collapse.

Govt should only order lock-down of areas/cities with high infection rate and monitor them on daily basis, not weekly basis.

Let's save lives AND economy.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Repeal second National Lockdown
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557045
